prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek, shark-like appearance and vibrant blue scales.
I want to design a powerful aquatic creature that has a fierce expression and sharp teeth.
Generate an intimidating Pokemon that thrives in ocean habitats and has a streamlined body.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by sharks, featuring a mix of blue and gray colors.
Imagine a formidable water Pokemon with a unique fin structure and a bold personality.
Make a sharp-toothed Pokemon that is known for its speed and agility in battles.
Give me a cool Pokemon design that embodies the essence of a predator in the sea.
